movieInfo:
Directed by: Pradeep KK
Starring by: Vishwadev Rachakonda, Priyanka Jain, Rao Ramesh
Genres by: Comedy, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Santhosh(Vishwadev Rachakonda) is a taxi driver who meets Shruthi(Priyanka Jain) during one of his journey’s. The pair falls in love with each other and even their parents say yes to their love story. As time passes by, Shruthi starts hating Santhosh all of a sudden.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Shridhar Marri
Starring by: Vijay Deverakonda, Shivani Singh, Nilakshi Singh
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Nikky (Vijay Deverakonda) is an irresponsible and insensitive gaming addict. Rags (Shivani) enters his life and challenges him to find her by playing a game designed by her. But things seem to be much more than just fun and games.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sanjeev K. Kumar
Host: Rana Daggubati
Guest: Sumanth and Eesha Rebba
Genres: Reality-TV
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: No.1 Yaari with Rana Season 2 Episode – 08 (02nd Dec 2018) and today guest Sumanth and Eesha Rebba.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Chandoo Mondeti
Starring by: Naga Chaitanya, Nidhhi Agerwal, Madhavan
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Vikram (Naga Chaitanya) has no power over his left hand, which is controlled by the twin he absorbed in the womb, named Aditya. While his unseen twin creates enough problems in his life, in comes Arun (Madhavan), someone who seems to hold a grudge against Vikram and his family.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Naveen Medaram
Starring by: Srinivas Avasarala, Sri Mukhi, Tejaswi Madivada
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The story of the film is based on the life of Madhav(Srinivasa Avasarala) who is a s.. addict. After having a number of affairs in his life, Madhav finally decides to settle down with Radha(Misthi). But things are not that easy as his controversial past keeps getting back to his current life time and again.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Shahin Sean Solimon
Written by: Shahin Sean Solimon, Evelyn Gabai
Starring by: Patrick Stewart, Lorna Raver, Isaac C. Singleton Jr.
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: When the Sultan’s firstborn is taken by an evil sorcerer, Sinbad is tasked with travelling to a desert of magic and creatures to save her.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Rahi Anil Barve, Anand Gandhi
Written by: Mitesh Shah, Adesh Prasad
Starring by: Cameron Anderson, Ronjini Chakraborty, Deepak Damle
Genres: Drama, Horror, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Hindi
movieDescription: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ramesh Sippy
Written by: Javed Akhtar, Salim Khan
Starring by: Sanjeev Kumar, Dharmendra, Amitabh Bachchan
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Musical, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sholay means embers in Hindi. In this particular movie, a Police Officer, who’s family was killed by a bandit named Gabbar Singh, decides to fight fire with fire and recruits two convicts, Jai and Veeru to capture Gabbar. He approaches them in jail, puts the proposal in front of them, and they agree to bring in Gabbar Singh alive – for a hefty price. After their discharge from jail, they travel by train to the village where the Police Officer lives – now with only his widowed daughter-in-law. The three band together to fight one of the most elusive and dreaded bandits of all time. Will the two ex-cons be able to bring Gabbar alive to the Police Officer?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gagan Gopal Molka
Starring by: Kamal Kamaraju, Pooja Ramachandran, Mouryani
Genres: Horror, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Vikram(Kamal Kamaraju) is a police officer who falls in love with his sister’s friend Radha(Mouryani). As time passes by, even Radha falls for Vikram and the couple spend some happy times together. On the other hand, Radha is often followed by her building watchman named Rudra. After a point in the story, the watchman and his four close friends keep getting killed one after the other.

movieInfo:
Created by: Sharad Devarajan, S.S. Rajamouli
Starring by: Viral Adhav, Manini M. Mishra, Manoj Pandey
Genres: Animation, Action, Adventure
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The series follows the relationship between the two cousins as they journey across the Kingdom of Mahishmati, uncovering hidden mysteries, stopping ancient terrors and defending their people from danger.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anup Bhandari
Starring by: Rana Daggubati, Avantika Shetty
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Rajaratham Movie Event Rajaratham Movie Event The story starts with the introduction of two characters Abhi(Nirup) and Megha (Avantika). They board into a bus named Rajaratham and the bus also has different characters with their own different stories. Both the college mates travel to Chennai in this bus along with others. Besides this story of Abhi and Megha, there is another story runs parallel to it. It is the story of young rebel leader Vishwa (Arya). He works with the ruling party and the government has put a huge task on his shoulders.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Tatineni Satya
Starring by: Sachiin Joshi, Esha Gupta, Kishore
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A Kabaddi player is arrested for the murder of his wife and is sent to a jail in Goa. The investigating police officer starts suspecting that there is more to this case than meets the eye.

movieInfo:
Host: Rana Daggubati
Guest: Nikhil Siddharth, Swathi Reddy
Genres: Reality-TV
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: No.1 Yaari with Rana Season 2 Episode – 07 (25th Nov 2018) and today guest Nikhil Siddharth, Swathi Reddy.

movieInfo:
Directed by: A. V. Siva Prasad
Starring by: Ankitha Muler, ramakrishna
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Rubin, a Muslim student living at the Harishcandra Prasad Hotel, one finde day dresses up as a Hindu girl and commits suicide. On the other hand, Raja, a young student who aspires to be a doctor, falls in love with Nandini. One day, Raja finds Nandini tying to commit a suicide. Who is behind these suicides, how Raja saves Nandini, forms the crux.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ravi Gundaboina
Starring by: Yashwanth, Amrita Acharya, Getup Srinu
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sameera(Amrita Acharya) is an orphan who does not enjoy life and saves all her income for the future. As time passes by, she gets affected by a deadly disease and doctors say that she has only a few months left in her life. Upset with this, she decides to enjoy the rest of the time and leaves to Thailand. There, she meets Ram(Yaswant) and falls in love with him. But Yaswant loves someone else and this breaks Sameera’s heart.

movieInfo:
Directed by:Rama Swamy
Starring by: Arjun Yagith, Bharath Bandaru, Sowmya Venugopal
Genres: Comedy, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Moodu Puvvulu Aaru Kayalu is the life story of three roommates portrayed by Arjun Yagith, Ramaswamy and Bharath Bandaru. Each of them has their own set of problems and try to come out of it.
